(Simplified: 闶)
Chinese Definition:
①(閌閬)方言，建築物中空廊的部分，如“這井下面的閌閌真大”。亦稱“閌閬子”。

閌字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kàng］
［《廣韻》苦浪切，去宕，溪。］
“闶1”的繁体字。
(1)高大貌。
(2)门限。
[②]［kāng］
［《集韻》丘岡切，平唐，溪。］
“闶2”的繁体字。
见“閌2閬”。

閌字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【門字部】　閌； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1331第13
【唐韻】苦浪切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】口浪切，?音亢。【說文】閌閬，高門也。【前漢·揚雄傳】閌閬閬其寥廓兮。【註】高門貌。　又【韻會】盛也。　又同伉。【文選·左思魏都賦】高門有閌。【註】毛詩曰：臯門有伉。與閌同。　又【集韻】丘岡切，音穅。義同。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Su Ji 1】【Men Zi Department】　闶; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 1331 to 13
[Tang Yun] bitter waves cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] [Zheng Yun] mouth waves cut, the sound is overwhelming. [Said Wen] Kailang, Gaomen Ye. 【Previous Han·Yang Xiong Biography】Cai Lang Lang Qi Liao Kuo Xi. [Note] High-level appearance.　[Rhyme Club] Sheng Ye.　The same couple again. [Selected Works · Zuo Si Wei Du Fu] Gaomen Youqi. [Note] Mao Shi said: There are couples in Gaomen. Same as Kai.　 [Ji Yun] Qiu Gang cut, sound chaff. The same meaning.
